column4: hey wats the difference in the DVD and CD download DVD has more compiled progs i expect?
yeah, DVD will include more.  I believe the DVD includes a liveCD and an installer, but that's pretty old info, don't know if that actually happened (or if its also on the CD)
the CD version is the full thing though, it's just that the DVD would include things you can install later (well, more things than the CD does), so you wouldn't have to download them.
